review.title: An image compression and encryption scheme based on deep learning
review.abstract: Stacked Auto-Encoder (SAE) is a kind of deep learning algorithm for unsupervised learning. Which has multi layers that project the vector representation of input data into a lower vector space. These projection vectors are dense representations of the input data. As a result, SAE can be used for image compression. Using chaotic logistic map, the compression ones can further be encrypted. In this study, an application of image compression and encryption is suggested using SAE and chaotic logistic map. Experiments show that this application is feasible and effective. It can be used for image transmission and image protection on internet simultaneously.

metadata.title: AN IMAGE COMPRESSION AND ENCRYPTION SCHEME BASED ON DEEP LEARNING

sections.text: Stacked Auto-Encoder (SAE) is a kind of deep learning algorithm for unattended learning. It has several levels that project the vector representation of the input data into a lower vector space. These projection vectors are dense representations of the input data. As a result, SAE can be used for image compression. By means of a chaotic logistic map, the compressed data can be further encrypted. In this study, an application of image compression and encryption using SAE and chaotic logistic map is proposed. Experiments show that this application is feasible and effective. It can be used simultaneously for image transmission and image protection on the Internet. Keywords: Stacked Auto-Encoding, Deep Learning, Image Protection, Image Property, Image Compression, Image Encoding.

sections.heading: 5. CONCLUSIONS
sections.text: An application of deep learning in image compression and encryption has been proposed. On the basis of neural SAE networks, images are compressed and then the compressed images are encrypted using a chaotic logistics card. This application can be used simultaneously for image transmission and image protection on the Internet.
